title: REFUND DATE extended(mods pls pin this)
content: Look at bottom text, is this true 100%???

comments.body: They will be extending it till the kcet first round results are not released.

They had told us that u can withdraw seat atleast TILL KCET ROUND 1 COUNSELLING RESULT HAS COME and get full refund. This is not even close?? July 15 max to max josaa counselling gets done, Cet can drag on till August!
Not great ðŸ˜­, they have changed the date. Either they've misguided us in that counselling or I heard them wrong no idea which
Well in councelling they did mention july 5 isn't fixed, it will change accordingly to kcet results
when will kcet choice filling start, any idea?

It might start by July end because they are waiting for UG-NEET counselling (till round 2 ig) to be completed.
I am not sure though.
Tentatively round 1 KCET results will be released in August.
Oh man that's a long wait. Thanks.
